text: @IngrahamAngle Hey Laura, I see the great Fauci is now recommending Remdesivier however, he so quickly dismissed hydroxychloroquine. I guess only he has all the answers. Can’t believe the President is still following his recommendations. Will never take a vaccine for Covid19.
